title: Quake II HD - Full package
description:
This is an updated version of a torrent I uploaded late 2013. If you download this torrent, PLEASE seed. Any fan of Quake II would love to have this.

It includes:
 - HD Textures
 - HQ Models
 - Quake Server Browser
 - R1Q2
 - KMQuake 2
 - The cutscenes
 - The original soundtrack by Sonic Mayhem
 - Both single player expansions (The Reckoning and Ground Zero), with soundtracks, ready to play

And best of all, you only need to extract it to play!


R1Q2 is best for multiplayer.
KMQuake 2 is best for single player.
The sound track will not play in R1Q2. You must use KMQuake to hear the soundtrack.


"Shortly after landing on an alien surface, you learn that hundreds of your men have been reduced to just a few. Now you must fight your way through heavily fortified military installations, lower the city's defenses and shut down the enemy's war machine. Only then will the fate of humanity be known." - http://store.steampowered.com/app/2320/
